attributes.conditions: Receive a $100 credit towards eligible charges when you book two nights or more with The Hotel Collection with AmexTravel.com. The Hotel Collection requires a two-night minimum stay. Eligible charges vary by property.
benefitsList: Room upgrade upon arrival when available
$100 USD equivalent credit towards eligible charges
attributes.enrollmentInstructions: No enrollment required. Benefits apply automatically when booking through AmexTravel.com.
